title: Transferred to Riot Account Team & 11 Days Later Still No Response.
body:
Last message I received. (Excluding "How'd we do survey?"


_Thanks for letting us know about your issue and submitting that information. I'll have to transfer you to our Accounts team, as they are the experts on this matter. This means there may be a short delay before you receive a response, but they will answer in this ticket so please bear with us while we transfer your issue!_

replies.body: If you reply to the ticket it should reopen it. Just tell them you got no response (check your spam first) and they should be able to fix it up. Something obviously got missed somewhere.
Thanks, I've just sent them a message in the same email discourse, here is to hoping for a speedy resolution,
